general: Operating Conditions: -30 °C ~ 60 °C (-22 °F ~ 140 °F) Humidity 95% or less (non-condensing) Power Supply: 12 VDC ± 10%, PoE (802.3af) Power Consumption: Max. 5.5W (7.5W with ICR on) Weather proof rating : IP66 IR range : Approx. 20 meters Dimensions: Φ140 x 99.9 mm (Φ 5.51” x 3.94”) Weight: 1000g
